short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Celebrate Christmas with a festive anime twist! Enjoy a lively scene of anime girls enjoying the holiday season on your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This live wallpaper brings the charm of Christmas and anime together in a delightful new tab experience. Each time you open a new tab, youâ€™re welcomed by a vibrant, animated scene featuring cute anime girls dressed in holiday outfits, surrounded by Christmas trees, gifts, and sparkling lights. The girls can be seen singing carols, playing in the snow, or enjoying festive treats, adding an extra layer of joy to your browsing.

Customize your experience with different holiday animations, like snowflakes gently falling, twinkling lights, and cheerful background music. Whether you're an anime fan or simply love the holiday season, this extension will fill your browser with Christmas cheer and a touch of anime magic. Let the fun, festive energy of anime girls celebrating Christmas brighten your screen with every new tab!
